content: row then on your last st single_crochet normally i single crocheted on the blo of the first three sts and single_crochet on the last stitch normally repeat r1-r2 until you get the desired length for your band tip occasionally wrap the band around your head to determine if it s to tight or too loose in the end i crocheted 70 row of single_crochet sewing tips 1 sew the 2 ends of the band together to form a circle 2 align the sewn band with the beret s openin use the long tail from the beret to sew it on 3 using the long tail from the yolk sew it on the cent of the beret base ~ d o n e ~ please remember that if you do need help or you have any questions reach out to my instagram or facebook page and i ll do my best to answer them instagram @y o h plus facebook @yarn over hook and if you need visual aid for this pattern here is the youtube tutorial for it > https //youtu be/0m-8mk86pyi
